short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You only have 1440 minutes every day, focuser reminds you to use them productively and stop procrastinating.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1440 is a magic number, this is how many minutes you've got every day to do something productive and useful. These minutes go very quickly and you don't even realise when you waste 60 of them on reddit. Current version notifies you how much time you've got until the end of the day to do something productive.
